Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery jar, the fabric is relatively coarse and grey in section, the interior is spotted with a thick brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and remains of eight lines of black-painted demotic text.
Curator's comments: Being studied for publication by Bryan Kraemer.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393504) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393504)
